chapter.title: Setting up the Example Application
chapter.para: This chapter describes the different steps you should take to get the application up and running.

section.title: Download the application
section.para: Download the Example Application as a stand-alone program. This program is self-contained, no additional software is required.
As an alternative you can download the Example Application as .war file. Use this alternative when you have an application server available to deploy the .war file.

section.title: Run the stand-alone application
section.para: The Example Application can be run by executing the appropriate startup script depending on your operating system.

listitem.para: Use startup.sh for Linux and Mac

section.para: Access the example web GIS application using your web browser on the following URL: localhost:8080

section.title: Stopping the stand-alone application
section.para: The Example Application can be stopped by executing the appropriate shutdown script depending on your operating system.

listitem.para: Use shutdown.sh for Linux and Mac
